author: Odeinoichus
title: Firefighter and his Fire Engine
review:
Set #6486 Fire Engine: A simple looking addition to the Fire Sub-Theme of LEGO Town, this truck is built up in two pieces, the front truck and the rear tool container trailer.

 

Using stickers for details and a strangely limited number of pieces to make the truck there are certainly a lot of odd choices in the design of this Fire Engine. I'm not sure if the engine tows the trailer section since I'm going off the picture (I haven't had this set for a very long time.), but I would expect that a connection piece would be used to tow the trailer.

 

The Mini-Figure is your typical Firefighter from LEGO Town, with the same black torso uniform print and the smiling Firefighters' face print. It includes a gray axe and a yellow oxygen tank along with the faceshield necessary for charging into a burning building to save the day.

 

This set is one I'm not sure how good it could have been, but there is definitely some potential there. It's a good small set for Firefighting enthusiasts and you can't go wrong with the pieces included in this set. I feel that it is a good addition to a burgeoning Fire section of your LEGO Town.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Fire) - Fire Engine Review
review:
This is a very nice set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

This set has two instructions. One instruction is for the truck and the other one is for the trailer. Both instructions have 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

For a number of 66 pieces I have to say that 10 USD are a little bit overpriced, because it is about 15 cents per piece. It would have been better if it had been about 10 cents per piece but think that we would have paid a little bit more if it was on sale today...

Minifigures

This set only has one minifig. The firefighter comes with a black uniform and he has a white helmet and a mask. It's a nice looking minifig. However: I like the firefighters from the LEGO City theme much more, because they've better details on the torso.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers. I don't think you'll need longer than 10 minutes to build it.
